name: Xenon Racer
description: Itâ€™s the year 2030, the era of flying vehicles. A one-off championship for wheel based vehicles has been organised, with cutting-edge electric cars boosted by Xenon gas. Drift through cities like Tokyo and Dubai as fast as you can and claim eternal glory!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64 bit Windows 10 / 8 / 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD FX-8150 3.6GHz or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti / Radeon HD 6790 2GB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard Additional Notes: Laptop versions of graphics cards may work but are not officially supported.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64 bit Windows 10 / 8 / 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 3.2 GHz / AMD Ryzen 5 1600X 3.6GHz or higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / Radeon HD 7950 3GB VRAM or higher DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard Additional Notes: Laptop versions of graphics cards may work but are not officially supported.
